title: What are the findings of M. Donato, an experimenter in zoomagnetism, and how do they apply to the theory being presented?
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discusses the complexity of creating a theory on zoomagnetism, a field that combines pure science and psychology. He explains how a theory is important to explain the cause behind the effect, and how he borrowed from the writings of M. Donato, one of the leading practitioners and experimenters in zoomagnetism. Now in the concluding part of the text, the author plans to use Donato's observations to explain his theory on zoomagnetism. This part presents a painting of the fascinated individuals painted by themselves and the author's personal experience of the sensation while under the magnetic spell.
content: J’emprunte donc aux écrits de Donato, et aux divers comptes rendus de ses séances, les détails des expériences auxquelles je vais, en les commentant, appliquer ma théorie. Je recevrai avec un réel plaisir les objections qu’il plaira au lecteur de me faire, et j'espère être assez heureux de pouvoir y répondre. (A continuer). A. Eugène, Professeur au Collège de Fiers. DONATO — LES FASCINÉS PEINTS PAR EUX-MÊMES 295 endormi, je ne pourrai que répéter la description que j’ai faite plus haut des sensations que j’éprouve au moment où je subis l’influence magnétique et où je me réveille, n’ayant absolument aucun souvenir de mes faits -et gestes durant mon sommeil. Voilà, Monsieur, tout ce que je crois pouvoir dire sans trop sortir du cadre que vous m’avez tracé. Lyon, le 3 avril 1880.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the author of the text shared their personal experience with the renowned magnetizer Donato and how their skepticism was overcome by the power of his magnetic influence. The author hopes that their account of the experience sheds some light on the mysteries of magnetism and invites readers to share their objections and feedback. The text offers a unique perspective on a subject that has fascinated humanity for centuries and may inspire further exploration and research in this field.
